Name: sot-sheikheliaskeke
Author: Sheikh Elias Keketso Lelia
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa (IDM)

Translations.Text: Ruri Mong`a lona ke `Mopi A le mong. Bohle ba sa kholoeng Bophelong Bo-tlang, lipelo tsa bona li hana ho amohela tsebo, ba ea ikhohomosa
Ruri Allah U tseba tseo ba li patang le tseo ba li pepesang. Ruri ha A rate baikhohomosi
Ha ho thoe ho bona: “Ke eng seo Mong`a lona A se senotseng?” ba re: “Lipale tse khale-khale,”
Ba tla fana ka bopaki ba liketso tsa bona ka Letsatsi la Tsoho ka botlalo, le liketso tsa ba khelositsoeng ke bona tlas’a ho hloka tsebo. Ruri o mahlonoko mojaro oo ba tlang ho o jara
